title: League Client Freezes computer screen after logging in
body:
Recently, whenever I attempt to enter a game, the league client bugs out and my whole screen freezes. The league client itself works just fine- only when entering the game itself does the client crash. The league client usually gets covered in some strange square, red graphical errors, then it spreads to the rest of the screen. I can still move my mouse but nothing else works. 

I am on Mac OS X 10.9.5

replies.body:
It sounds like you might be experiencing some nasty driver issues or (hopefully not) hardware failure. To determine what the heck is going on, I recommend going through our [**System Crash Guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes#section-mac) to ensure your SMC and NVRAM are fine and that this cannot be easily resolved with a common solution.

Let me know if those steps caused any noticeable change.
